title: [娱乐][汉化]icJukeBox —— 好用的紅石點唱機[1.8.1-1.9+]
author: a31712001
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 19:00 编辑 

大家好我是來自台灣的Minecraft玩家神影楓痕
我看很多服務器缺娛樂用的音樂插件
我來介紹一個在MCBBS沒有的紅石音樂插件



icJukeBox
插件前置:NoteBlockAPI 




dYppMGA.jpg (164.65 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2016-8-24 12:36 上传









Features 插件特性
可自行整理自己的紅石音樂到選單裡面只需將.nbs歌曲“tracks”文件夾內隨機播放歌曲使用隨機音樂使用隨機音樂模式能夠配置菜單按鈕，聊天消息和更多可設定玩家登入服務器內就可以自動播放音樂可在服務器內自行重新載入配置服務器音樂廣播模式配置大廳選項

Commands 命令/music - 打開音樂列表/music <頁碼> - 打開音樂列表中指定的頁/music item 拿到插件的物品可以直接打開/music off - 關閉音樂/music random - 播放隨機音樂/music shuffle - 啟用隨機音樂模式/music shuffle skip - 跳到下一首歌曲（只適用於已啟用隨機播放模式）/music reload - 重新載入插件配置/music radio [on/off] - 打開或關閉廣播音樂/music radio skip - 跳過廣播音樂
Permissions 權限music.list - 打開音樂選單的許可music.random - 使用隨機音樂的許可music.shuffle - 使用隨機音樂模式的許可music.shuffle.skip - 使用隨機音樂模式跳到下一首的許可music.reload - 使用重新載入插件的許可music.radio - 使用廣播模式的許可music.radio.skip -  使用廣播模式跳到下一首的許可music.item.spawn.[shuffle/radio/random/list] 拿出其中一音樂插件的物品的許可music.item.use.[shuffle/radio/random/list] 使用其中一種音樂插件的許可

Installation 插件安裝方式將您需要的版本丟入插件資料夾中重啟服務器使用/music 開啟音樂
Adding extra songs 添加額外音樂原文預設音樂下載 here.將下載好的.nbs音樂檔丟入 插件資料夾內的tracks資料夾內使用/music reload 重新載入配置使/music 開始享受音樂


插件配置 configuration.yml
=====================================================
=                    StatioCraft                    =
=                      JukeBox                      =
=---------------------------------------------------=
=                Plugin Configuration               =
=====================================================

# The size of the musiclist GUI
# NOTE: make sure the size is at least 9
# also make sure the size can be divided by 9
# (for instance: 9, 18, 27, 36, 45, 54, etc.)
# The specified size does NOT include the top-row
# containing navigation items
# If the requirements above are not met, the plugin
# will use it's default-value
other_default_menu_size: 45

# The action which will be performed when a player
# joins the server
# 3 = turn on server-radio
# 2 = play random song
# 1 = enable shuffle-mode
# 0 = do nothing
other_action_on_join: 1

# The message shown in the music-list inventory title
# Use #CURRENT to insert the current pagenumber
# Use #TOTAL to insert the total amount of pages
string_menu_title: &5音樂列表  -  頁 &d#CURRENT&5/#TOTAL

# The message shown when someone disables a music track
string_music_disable: &c音樂關閉

# The message shown when someone enables shuffle-mode
string_music_shuffle: &6隨機播放模式啟用

# The message shown when a new track is starting
# Use #TRACK to insert the song name
string_music_nowplaying: &a現在播放的曲目&2: #TRACK

# The message shown when someone enables radio-mode
string_radio_enable: &a音樂盒啟用

# The message shown when someone disables radio-mode
string_radio_disable: &c音樂盒關閉

# The message shown when someone already has radio-mode enabled
string_radio_alreadyenabled: &6您的音樂盒已經開啟

# The message shown when a radio-song is being skipped
string_radio_skip: &6跳至下一個音樂

# The message shown when someone enables shuffle-mode
string_shuffle_enable: &a隨機播放已啟用

# The message shown when someone disables shuffle-mode
string_shuffle_disable: &c隨機播放已關閉

# The message shown when a someone skips a track in shuffle-mode
string_shuffle_skip: &6跳到下一首歌曲

# The message shown when an item is given
# Use #ITEM to insert the item name
# Use #PLAYER to insert the player name
string_item_give: &a成功發送項目 &2#ITEM &a給玩家 &2#PLAYER



# The item used inside the GUI to move one page backward
item_menu_page_backward: 368:0 1 name:&5&l上一頁

# The item used inside the GUI to move one page forward
item_menu_page_forward: 381:0 1 name:&6&l下一頁

# The item used inside the GUI to close the page
item_menu_page_close: 378:0 1 name:&4&l關閉

# The item used inside the GUI to disable music
item_menu_music_disable: 341:0 1 name:&c&l禁用音樂

# The item used inside the GUI to enable the server radio
item_menu_music_radio: 264:0 1 name:&3&l伺服器收音機

# The item used inside the GUI to enable a random song
item_menu_music_random: 84:0 1 name:&2&l隨機挑一首音樂播放

# The item used inside the GUI to enable shuffle-mode
item_menu_music_shuffle: 30:0 1 name:&9&l隨機播放模式

# The item which can be held by a player and used to enable the server radio
item_player_music_radio: 264:0 1 name:&3&l切換收音機
# Whether the item above is enabled
other_item_radio_enabled: true
# Whether the item above can be dropped
other_item_radio_candrop: false

# The item which can be held by a player and used to enable a random song
item_player_music_random: 84:0 1 name:&6&l隨機播放歌曲
# Whether the item above is enabled
other_item_random_enabled: true
# Whether the item above can be dropped
other_item_random_candrop: false

# The item which can be held by a player and used to enable shuffle-mode
item_player_music_shuffle: 2256:0 1 name:&a&l切換音樂
# Whether the item above is enabled
other_item_shuffle_enabled: true
# Whether the item above can be dropped
other_item_shuffle_candrop: false

# The item which can be held by a player and used to open the music GUI
item_player_music_list: 339:0 1 name:&5&l音樂
# Whether the item above is enabled
other_item_list_enabled: true
# Whether the item above can be dropped
other_item_list_candrop: false

# When set to true the plugin will use the name stored inside a song-file
# When set to false the plugin will use the name of a song-file itself
other_use_song_names_for_discs: true

replies.txt_content:
xiaodobi2333 发表于 2016-8-25 07:26
可自行整理自己的紅石音樂到選單裡面

放出来的音乐是音符盒的声音？？
你要使用副擋名為.nbs
的音樂才行喔

要使用Minecraft Note Block Studio製作
